label.label: To calibrate the speed regulation, mark a scale tenth of a unit (Mile or Kilometre), place loco
on track with correct direction set, F0 turned off and enough distance from the Start marker
to allow for the acceleration (change momentum settings if neccessary). Write '1' to CV 135
using a cab or the Single CV Programmer, then drive the loco through the marked section at
a mid speed, turning F0 on at the Start marker and off at the End marker.
If several calibration runs are performed at different speeds and the Calibration Result read
after each one, the Calibration Result should be approximately the same
